item.title: He said “wish you were here” … I’m already in the closet
item.description: A playful take on surprise visits- literally already in his closet waiting.

media:content.media:title: He said “wish you were here” … I’m already in the closet
media:content.media:description: A playful take on surprise visits- literally already in his closet waiting.

item.title: Not the ex calling from jail
item.description: Storytime about that one wild night my boyfriend’s ex decided to call him… from jail.

item.title: Every time he says baby… instant melt
item.description: A sweet reaction moment - I hear “baby” and suddenly everything’s better.

item.title: Gaining the sister’s approval like a pro
item.description: Trying to form an alliance with my boyfriend’s sister - priorities, right?

item.title: I’m chilling, she’s causing waves
item.description: That one friend who can’t just relax by the pool - and I love her for it.

item.title: You’ll never find a girl like me… or my squad
item.description: That moment when your friend group walks in and proves we all shine the same way.

item.title: Protect your peace, always
item.description: A reminder to stay grounded - not everyone’s opinion deserves space in your mind.

item.title: Funny how their version always sounds different
item.description: Reacting to hearing someone’s remix of our friendship story - and it’s not adding up.

item.title: Girls night + Top Gun Maverick = Perfection
item.description: Throwback to watching Top Gun Maverick on repeat - pure fun with the girls.

item.title: Skincare, pajamas, peace of mind
item.description: Nothing beats comfy nights at home with good skincare and Target finds.

item.title: Slowly but surely getting stronger each day
item.description: Paige shares her determination while trying a plank after scoliosis recovery.

item.title: When you leave the house like the CEO of overpacking
item.description: Paige pokes fun at bringing way too many essentials before leaving the house.

item.title: Bestie presence is my daily therapy
item.description: Paige shares how just hanging out with her best friend Kate makes her happy.

item.title: Me remembering I have a bf like… oh hi baby
item.description: Paige teases her boyfriend in a playful, flirty way.

item.title: Becoming friends because of her brother was the best twist
item.description: Paige shares a funny take on how friendships sometimes start in unexpected ways.

item.title: When she puts her phone down I know the tea is hot
item.description: Paige jokes with Kate about that moment you know your friend has some serious tea to spill.

item.title: 6’5?! Sir, that’s basically a skyscraper
item.description: Paige jokes about being shocked at just how tall someone really is.

item.title: Guess I’m officially the cool aunt now
item.description: Paige reacts with joy to her friend being pregnant with her brother’s baby.

item.title: Family dinners are just interviews in disguise
item.description: Paige lip syncs to a funny take on family dinners full of endless questions.

item.title: 5 years later and still getting carded everywhere
item.description: Paige jokes about still looking way younger than she really is.
